directions: Mix loquats, strawberries, red onion, cilantro, garlic, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, salt, and black pepper in a bowl. Refrigerate salsa several hours before serving.
ingredients: 20 fresh loquats - seeded, blossom ends removed, and diced
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and diced - or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Strawberry Loquat Salsa
